contextual_notes: The user appears to be in the early stages of finding a caregiver, exploring options and seeking guidance.
The user values simplicity and local solutions, indicating a preference for straightforward processes.
general_insights: Users benefit from flexible and local solutions that align with their specific needs.
Breaking down complex tasks into manageable steps can help alleviate user overwhelm.
Providing reassurance and guidance is crucial when users express uncertainty or stress.
